version_description:
* Fixed a bug where the novel viewer would crash on iPad
* Fixed a bug where the ranking type titles were incorrect

○作品分享在Facebook和LINE 
○修正了新颖的书签页面不会加载错误

○ Fixed a bug where the ugoira (animated illustrations) play button wouldn't show up
○ Fixed a bug where some actions in the share menu weren't working properly

・添加了漫画浏览器
・对应iPhone 6/6 Plus

pixiv Magazine, a new monthly publication on iOS!

Fixes in this version
* Private bookmarks not loading
* Manga not being displayed properly on iOS 7

* You can now tell the type and amount of images in a work from the thumbnail
* Fixed a crash bug in pixiv Spotlight on iPad
* Other bug fixes and improvements

- Support for displaying furigana in novels
- Now you can directly sign up from the app
- Bug fixes

- Support for displaying furigana in novels
- Bug fixes
- Added illustration submission feature. Upload images directly from your camera or album!
・You can now send your thoughts and suggestions from the settings menu.

New updates to our pixiv app!

【Main Changes】
○Rating and favoriting works are now combined as “Like!”
　・Works you have favorited are in your "Collection".
　・Review works you Like! in your "Collection".
　・You can add tags or like a work privately by long pressing the Like! button.
○With the new Home menu you can view the ranking, "Recommended" works (New), and pixiv Spotlight all in one place.
　・"Recommended" works are based on popular works on pixiv and works which you Like!
　・See all the rankings by tapping the "Daily Ranking" at the top of Home menu.
　・Check out pixiv Spotlight by choosing the "Illust" or "Manga" tabs on the Home menu and scrolling down below "Recommended".

【New Features】
・Like!
・Recommended
・Related works
・Search suggestions
・View options for search results, new from following, and collection
・Delete novel bookmarks

【Removed Features】
・Rating feature
・Favoriting feature
　Works you have favorited are in your "Collection".
・Feed
　Feed is now part of your "Recommended" works on the Home menu.
・Recommended menu and ranking menu
　Ranking, recommended, and pixiv Spotlight are now part of the Home menu.
・Landscape orientation support
・Deleting cache (This feature will be restored at a later point)

You can view these changes under Help.

Changes in version 6.0.1:
・Fixed a bug where images were attached to Twitter when using the share feature
・Fixed a bug which prevented the app from launching
・Other bug fixes

Changes in version 6.0.0:
New updates to our pixiv app!

【Main Changes】
○Rating and favoriting works are now combined as “Like!”
　・Works you have favorited are in your "Collection".
　・Review works you Like! in your "Collection".
　・You can add tags or like a work privately by long pressing the Like! button.
○With the new Home menu you can view the ranking, "Recommended" works (New), and pixiv Spotlight all in one place.
　・"Recommended" works are based on popular works on pixiv and works which you Like!
　・See all the rankings by tapping the "Daily Ranking" at the top of Home menu.
　・Check out pixiv Spotlight by choosing the "Illust" or "Manga" tabs on the Home menu and scrolling down below "Recommended".

【New Features】
・Like!
・Recommended
・Related works
・Search suggestions
・View options for search results, new from following, and collection
・Delete novel bookmarks

【Removed Features】
・Rating feature
・Favoriting feature
　Works you have favorited are in your "Collection".
・Feed
　Feed is now part of your "Recommended" works on the Home menu.
・Recommended menu and ranking menu
　Ranking, recommended, and pixiv Spotlight are now part of the Home menu.
・Landscape orientation support
・Deleting cache (This feature will be restored at a later point)

You can view these changes under Help.

+++ If you can’t launch the app +++
Some devices running iOS 9 aren't able to open the pixiv app or other apps. This was fixed in the latest version of iOS (9.3.2).
If your device can't launch the app then please backup and update to iOS 9.3.2 or later from "Settings" -> "General" -> "Software Update".

---
Changes in version 6.0.2:
・Improved view transition performance on iOS 8
・Fixed a bug where some comments weren't fully displayed
・Improved search behavior
・Other bug fixes

Changes in version 6.0.3:
・You can now delete individual search history entries.
　Swipe a history entry to the left to reveal the delete button.
・Improved loading of images on the illust and manga details pages.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.0.4:
・Added the "Recommended Users" feature.
　Tap the "Recommended Users" banner at the top of the "New from Following" screen to see users recommended to you based on other users you follow.
・The app now retains the selected tab state even after it's closed.
・Fixed the top and bottom margins when reading novels in vertical text mode.
・Added a feature to delete the cache and search history.
　From the "My Page" menu tap on "Settings" and "Clear History and Cache" to access the feature.　
・You can now search for users by their user ID.
・Other improvements and bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.0.6:
・pixiv Spotlight is now pixivision.
　pixivision is a platform for created media: illustrations, manga, novels and music. A place for pieces of work under the idea that "Things are born from the seedlings of creativity", presenting otaku culture to the world, to people who want to liven up their everyday life.
・Other bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.0.12:
・Fixed a crash which could occur when searching on certain devices running iOS 8.
・Updated the pixivision design.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.1.0:
・Revamped the user profile screen.
　See the user's profile and what type of works they submit at a glance.
　Easily see the user's submitted works and collections.
・Other bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.1.1:
・Fixed a crash which could occur on the novel series screen.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.1.2:
・Added support for iOS 10.

Changes in version 6.1.3:
・Added a "mute" feature.
　Set certain creators or tags to hide.
　Use pixiv without worrying about spoilers or works you don't want to see.
　Mute is a pixiv Premium feature but standard users can try it out by muting up to one creator or tag.
　Add or remove mutes from the mute settings accessible from the dot menu on the work details screen.
・Multiple bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.1.4:
・Fixed a crash in the novel viewer.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.1.3:
・Added a "mute" feature.
　Set certain creators or tags to hide.
　Use pixiv without worrying about spoilers or works you don't want to see.
　Mute is a pixiv Premium feature but standard users can try it out by muting up to one creator or tag.
　Add or remove mutes from the mute settings accessible from the dot menu on the work details screen.
・Multiple bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.2.0:
・Redesigned the home menu ranking unit.
　Tap "View More" to view each individual ranking.
・Redesigned  the novel details page and novel viewer page.
　Check the novel's caption directly from the novel list.
　Tap on the novel text to show/hide the title and toolbar.
　View the work details by tapping the icon in the top-right corner of the novel viewer page.
　You can comment from the work details page by tapping the icon in the top-right corner of the novel viewer page.
・Fixed a bug where zooming in on some images would cause parts of the image to be cut off.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.1.3:
・Added a "mute" feature.
　Set certain creators or tags to hide.
　Use pixiv without worrying about spoilers or works you don't want to see.
　Mute is a pixiv Premium feature but standard users can try it out by muting up to one creator or tag.
　Add or remove mutes from the mute settings accessible from the dot menu on the work details screen.
・Multiple bug fixes.

・Fixed a crash in the novel viewer.

　Tap on the novel text to show/hide the title and toolbar.
　View the work details by tapping the icon in the top-right corner of the novel viewer page.
　You can comment from the work details page by tapping the icon in the top-right corner of the novel viewer page.
・Fixed a bug where zooming in on some images would cause parts of the image to be cut off.
・Other bug fixes.

Changes in version 6.5.0:
・Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.5.1:
・Fixed a crash when viewing a list of users on iOS 8.

Changes in version 6.5.2:
・Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.6.0:
・Fixed a bug where the currently set birthday wasn't being displayed correctly on the profile settings page.
・Bug fixes and improvements.

Version 6.6.1 has the following important fixes:

- Fixed a possible crash at the launch screen in version 6.6.0.
- While 6.6.1 fixes the above crash, there is another remaining problem where the app may be slow to launch.
- The slow launch problem will be fixed in the next version, 6.6.2.

Version 6.6.2 has the following important fixes:
- Fixed a slow launch problem.

Changes in version 6.7.0:
・Revamped the profile settings page.
　The profile information settings page is now easier to use.
　Access your profile settings from "My Page > Settings > Profile Settings".
　You can check your profile from "My Page > View my profile".
・Other bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.7.1:
・Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.8.0:
・Linked Pawoo accounts are now shown on the user profile page.
　・You can choose to show or hide your Pawoo account from the settings page.
・Fixed a crash on the profile settings page on iPad.
・Other fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 6.8.5:
・Fixed a bug where swiping in the illust viewer would result in automatically scrolling to the top.

Changes in version 6.8.6:
・Recommended users are now displayed after following a user.

Changes in version 6.9.0:
・It's now easier to view works which are part of a series
　・A series is a collection of multiple manga posted to pixiv
　・After viewing a work in a series you can easily navigate to the previous or next work in the series
　・You can easily navigate to a list of works in a series from any work in that series
　*Currently, there is no way to create a series from within the app

Changes in version 7.0.0:
・Added support for submitting multiple images (illustrations/manga)
・Works you submitted can now be deleted
  ・Using the dot menu in the work details screen
  ・From the Submitted Works screen by swiping left on the work you wish to delete

Changes in version 7.0.1:
* Fixed a bug that prevented work counts from being updated in the Submitted Works screen directly after submitting a work.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.3:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.4:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.5:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.7:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.6:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.7:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.8:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes in version 7.0.9:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* You can now search for works submitted during a specific date range.
* You can now search for works by their "Like!" count (Premium feature).
  * These can be set using the upper right options button when viewing search results.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Increased the maximum number of mutes from 100 to 200. (Premium feature)
* You can now reply directly to comments.
* You can now delete your submitted comments, as well as comments on works you submitted.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Comments and subtitles belonging to the streamers in live viewings are now easier to tell apart from other comments.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Works can now be zoomed directly from the work details screen when you want to view them in a larger size.
  * They can be resized to your liking by performing a pinch gesture on illustrations, manga or Ugoira.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* The Live viewer has been redesigned.
  - Viewer window size has been increased in portrait mode.
  - Lives can now be zoomed using the pinch gesture.

* Added a new feature: Shoutout.
  - Viewers can now show their support to streamers with this new feature.
  - Using Shoutout requires points, which can be purchased for a fixed fee.
  - Can only be sent to streamers that have enabled the feature.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

7.1.16 Changes

* Bug fixes and improvements.

7.1.15 Changes

* The Live viewing screen has been redesigned.
  - Live window size has been increased.
  - Lives can now be zoomed using the pinch gesture.

* Added a new feature: Shoutout.
  - Viewers can now show their support to streamers with this new feature.
    - Using Shoutout requires points, which can be purchased for a fixed fee.
    - Can only be sent to streamers that have enabled the feature.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

7.1.17 Changes
* Bug fixes and improvements.

7.1.15 Changes

* The Live viewing screen has been redesigned.
- Live window size has been increased.
- Lives can now be zoomed using the pinch gesture.

* Added a new feature: Shoutout.
- Viewers can now show their support to streamers with this new feature.
- Using Shoutout requires points, which can be purchased for a fixed fee.
- Can only be sent to streamers that have enabled the feature.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* New popular search types have been added. You can now search by popularity among men and among women. (Premium feature)
* Bug fixes and improvements.

7.2.1
* Fixed a bug.

7.2.0
* New popular search types have been added. You can now search by popularity among men and among women. (Premium feature)
* Bug fixes and improvements.

・修正了一些 bug 
・提高了部分结构的稳定性

* This release contains several bug fixes.

- Announcing the end of support for iOS 9

As of November 2018, iOS 9 will no longer be supported by this app. Versions 7.3.0 onwards will be unable to be used by devices running iOS 9. To receive future updates of this app, please consider updating your version of iOS. If your device does not support iOS 10, please consider using the mobile version of our website.

- MyPage中的"投稿作品"栏已更名为"作品管理"
- 添加了全新的小说投稿的功能
    - 通过点击在MyPage页面中的"投稿"按钮，选择"小说"选项，即可进行小说投稿了
- 在小说投稿页面中添加了草稿保存功能
    - 在小说投稿页面中，通过点击屏幕下方的"保存草稿"来保存草稿
    - 通过选择作品管理页面中的小说草稿，来继续编辑未投稿的小说
